Recent updates in New York City include police responding to bomb threats and suspicious packages, the installation of AI cameras by FDNY for fire detection, and a new housing lottery launch, while Mayor Adams endorses Cuomo against Mamdani in the upcoming election.

### Risks & Alerts

- Police give 'all clear' on alleged bomb threat targeting NYU buses. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikwFBVV95cUxPQTlXODY1dEwycTJmd2hWOHZXZG55dHhlNERERzBrLTJrcGFqNlZtcDdJeW1EMHh1bHVJXzBZc3dIbzRfcUN5bWluUVFGUkNlc2Fwa0hVelk3Wm50dGl5bkpjc3dXbzJLOEFQbjVoZmJkNnVaSlpLMVZmNEdXNGtnWmEteWIzNVhQWEMtY3E5ZkJ2MlE?oc=5)
- NYPD responds to report of suspicious package at Staten Island Ferry terminal in Manhattan. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- FAA delays more flights in New York, Houston, and Washington. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics
